name: life is dull.
description:
gather the hearts to fill the empty void that you convey. converse and harbor with the rose.

heed my advice and search for what you seek. 

inspired by antoine de saint-exupéry's le petit prince

- - - / end credits / - - -

thank you for playing my small, tiny, short, little game. it isn't much but i hope you guys enjoyed it and got something from it. we were tasked to create a game using bitsy and this is what i came up with.

the little prince is my favorite book and i still read it to this day. if you haven't read it before, i recommend you do. it's a children's book but the story holds such a meaningful, eloquent, and profound  message that is worthy of reading.

tip: wander around. :3
